about_the_game:
Create your own path
Some say college is the best time of your life. Is it true? In this game – yes! Even if you graduated long ago, it is never too late to enjoy the rush of university years once again. Create the perfect student by choosing the finest set of qualities and skills. An extraverted party animal or a hard-working bookworm – it’s up to you to decide! Experience the prime of youth with your character and bring it through four years of college’s hardships…



Make Friends and Frenemies!
Networking is the key to successful college life. Being a lone wolf is difficult, so join a fraternity to meet people with similar goals and ambitions. Take part in mysterious initiations, help organize annual events, and make a contribution to a hundred-year-old tradition. If fraternities aren’t for you, just enjoy your ordinary life with other students. While looking to forge friendships, you may find something a little more spicy. After all, being in love isn’t forbidden on our campus…



Discover the holy grail of work – life balance
While trying to survive from day to day, don’t forget to study. Unfortunately, partying isn’t the solution to all your problems. Try to find time to review the material alone or with friends. Attending lectures will actually help you pass upcoming exams. Unbelievable, right?! However, all work and no play makes a student a dull boy. In all this craziness, you have to maintain a balance between draining hard work and a vivid social life. Various campus activities will surely help you with that!



Become a campus celebrity
We almost forgot about the last factor of a successful college life – reputation! Grades, connections, and even graduation don’t matter if your name is nonexistent. There is no point in doing your best if no one knows about you. The conclusion is simple – maintaining your reputation is crucial. Build up your fame by networking with influential students, completing goals and achievements, and accumulating good grades. It’s that simple! Do everything you can to graduate as the most famous student!



Take part in many activities available on campus:
  • Attend classes
  • Explore the various clubs
  • Support your fraternity/sorority
  • Throw parties
  • Meet with friends
  • Deepen relationships
  • Work part-time to pay tuition
  • Decorate and chill out in your dorm room.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 / Phenom x4 955
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 / AMD R7-260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: In Campus Life you’ll create your own college freshman. Experience the hardships of college in this amusing and engaging life sim game. Study hard and party even harder. Join a fraternity to meet new interesting individuals. It is entirely up to you how your academic career will progress!
supported_languages:
